statements: SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT lead_id, first_name, job_title FROM leads WHERE company = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM leads ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE buyer_persona = 'Prospect';
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE job_title = 'Manager' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, company, buyer_persona FROM leads WHERE industry = 'Healthcare' AND job_title = 'Doctor' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE job_title LIKE 'Engineer%' AND industry IN ('Technology', 'Manufacturing') ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM leads WHERE industry = 'Finance' ORDER BY email ASC, phone_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM buyer_personas;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM buyer_personas WHERE persona_category = 'General';
SELECT * FROM buyer_personas WHERE id = 3;
SELECT first_name, company FROM buyer_personas ORDER BY company ASC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM lead_information WHERE lead_score > 75;
SELECT * FROM buyer_personas WHERE persona_category = 'Marketing';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, company FROM lead_information WHERE lead_score > 80 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, industry FROM lead_information WHERE job_title = 'CEO' OR job_title = 'CTO';
SELECT * FROM buyer_personas WHERE company LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email, lead_score FROM lead_information WHERE company = 'ABC Inc.' AND industry IN ('Technology', 'Healthcare') ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM leads WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT lead_email FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_phone, lead_interest FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT persona_name, persona_description FROM buyer_personas;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_interest = 'Product A';
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_id = 1001;
SELECT lead_name, lead_phone FROM leads WHERE lead_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT l.lead_name, p.persona_name FROM leads l INNER JOIN lead_personas lp ON l.lead_id = lp.lead_id INNER JOIN buyer_personas p ON lp.persona_id = p.persona_id;
SELECT DISTINCT lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_interest IN ('Product A', 'Product B');
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM Segmentations WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM CommunicationStrategies WHERE strategy_id >= 5;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT * FROM BuyerPersonas WHERE persona_name = 'Corporate';
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM Segmentations ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM CommunicationStrategies WHERE strategy_description LIKE '%email%' AND strategy_description NOT LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE lead_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY lead_id ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_phone FROM Leads;
SELECT * FROM Buyer_Personas;
SELECT persona_id, persona_name FROM Buyer_Personas;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone, lead_segment FROM Leads;
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE lead_segment='VIP';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT lead_phone, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_name='John Doe' AND lead_segment='New Customers';

SELECT lead_name, lead_email, persona_name FROM Leads JOIN Leads_Buyer_Personas ON Leads.lead_id = Leads_Buyer_Personas.lead_id JOIN Buyer_Personas ON Leads_Buyer_Personas.persona_id = Buyer_Personas.persona_id;

SELECT lead_name, segment_name, segment_criteria FROM Leads JOIN Leads_Segmentation ON Leads.lead_id = Leads_Segmentation.lead_id JOIN Segmentation ON Leads_Segmentation.segment_id = Segmentation.segment_id;
